Join Our Postgraduate Programmes
================================

### Faculty of Computing

[Registration Kits 2024/2025 sem 1](https://comp.utm.my/postgraduate#registrationkits)

Doctor of Philosophy - Field: Computer Science
----------------------------------------------

This programme allows students to conduct an independent research in an area of computer science, under the supervision of a member staff with related expertise

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/doctor-of-philosophy-cs/)

Doctor of Philosophy - Field: Software Engineering
--------------------------------------------------

The programme is offered on full-time basis and is based on a 2-Semester per academic session. This is a full research programme. The candidate is supervised by a lecturer.

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/doctor-of-philosophy-se/)

Doctor of Philosophy - Field: Informatics Engineeering
------------------------------------------------------

The programme is offered on full-time basis and is based on 2-Semester per academic session. This ia a full research programme. 

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/doctor-of-philosophy-ci/)

Master of Philosophy -  
Field: Software Engineering
----------------------------------------------------

In this programme is a full guided research Master programme designed for candidates who wish to obtain knowledge, skills and expertise in software engineering theories and able to apply them to produce high quality software and to propose new or improved software engineering techniques methods and tools.

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/master-of-philosophy-se/)

Master of Philosophy -  
Field: Computer Science
------------------------------------------------

These programmes allow students to conduct an independent research in an area of Computer Science, under the supervision of a members of staff with related expertise Assessment is by semester progress reports and a thesis examination (viva voce).

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/master-of-philosophy-cs/)

Master of Computer Science
--------------------------

This program is offered on full-time basis and is based on a 2-semester per academic session. This is a mixed-mode

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/master-cs/)

Master in Data Science
----------------------

In this programme, MSc (Data Science), you will gain a solid understanding of the methods used in data science.

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/master-of-science-ds/)

Master in Innovative Computing
------------------------------

The program is a general program for computing field that provides exposure in computing science, science and technology engineering, mathematics and social sciences.

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/master-ic/)

Master of Cyber Security
------------------------

This program is designed to produce ethical cybersecurity experts with cutting-edge skills and knowledge to protect organizations from evolving cyber threats. Benefit from industry-leading lecturers, hands-on learning experiences, and wide networking opportunities. Secure your place in one of the fastest-growing fields and become a leader in safeguarding the digital world.

[Click here](https://comp.utm.my/master-csy/)

Doctor of Professional Practice (DPP)
-------------------------------------

The Doctor of Professional Practice program, the first of its kind in Malaysia by UTM, combines coursework and research, allowing professionals to apply their experience to doctoral-level research. 

[Click here](https://odl.utm.my/doctor-of-professional-practice-dpp/)

###### NEW COURSE

ODL Master of Cyber Security
----------------------------

This programme is designed to meet the needs for flexibility and convenience through fully online teaching and learning Open Distance Learning (ODL) enables study from anywhere anytime while accesing top-tier education.

[Click here](https://odl.utm.my/master-of-cyber-security/)

ODL Master of Computer Science
------------------------------

The Master of Computer Science is offered on a full-time basis (open Distance Learning). The Open Distance Learning (ODL) study is conducted fully online.

[Click here](https://odl.utm.my/master-of-computer-science/)

![](https://comp.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/Image_fasiliti02.jpg)

Document Requirements for Admission Application
-----------------------------------------------

Local Student

*     Bachelor/Master Qualification
*     Bachelor/Master Academic Transcripts.
*     Sponsor Letter (if applicable).
*     Referees statement(s) (if applicable).
*     Research proposal (for research mode).
*     Mykad-sized photograph.
*     Proof of Working Experience (if applicable).
*     Copy of Mykad (with photo and personal details).
*     Proof of Processing Fees.

International Student

*     Bachelor/Master Qualification
*     Bachelor/Master Academic Transcripts.
*     English language certificate (IELTS/ TOFEL/ TOFEL IBT/ ELS CIEP/ TEEP).
*     Sponsor Letter (if applicable).
*     Referees statement(s) (if applicable).
*     Research proposal (for research mode).
*     Passport-sized photograph.
*     Proof of Working Experience (if applicable).
*     Copy of Passport (with photo and personal details.)
*     Proof of Processing Fees.

[Registration Kits | Semester 1, Session 2024/2025](https://comp.utm.my/postgraduate#)
